item.title: PbABCG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbABCG1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Phalaenopsis bellina Functional Descriptions: PbABCG1 and PbABCG2 transporters are required for the emission of floral monoterpenes in Phalaenopsis bellina.

item.title: PbWoxT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbWoxT1 Gene Name: WUSCHEL-RELATEDHOMEOBOX WOX Genome: Species: Pyrus betulifolia Functional Descriptions: PbWoxT1 mRNA from pear (Pyrus betulaefolia) undergoes long-distance transport assisted by a polypyrimidine tract binding protein.
